Class SideBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • map.SideBar

  • public class SideBar
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for SideBar. Contains methods related to manage sidebar items, drawing text

      • SideBar

        public SideBar(double tileWidth,
               double tileHeight,
               double leftOffset,

        Constructor to initialize SideBar

        tileWidth - The width of the tile

        leftOffset - Left offset value for tile

      • setActive

        public void setActive(SpriteType type,
                      boolean value)
        Method to enable/disable tiles in SideBar
        Parameters:
        type - The tile whose state is to be changed
        value - True/False. To Set state according to the value.
